channel.title: Party doesn't occupy people if they were redirected to you via CW tornado
channel.description:
I died on a night I partied. NK (sorc) was already dead, so I assumed that unseen must have an enforcer. When the post-game screen comes up, I realize their were no converted knights that game, so no possible enforcers. A CW has tornadoed me that night, however. This is what I believe may have made the attack bypass the party.
I don't know if this is intended behavior, but it is certainly very unintuitive.

item.title: Party doesn't occupy people if they were redirected to you via CW tornado
item.dc:creator: adinsx
item.description:
just had another game where the same thing happened, except this time CW was dead. So I guess it’s just the 3-occupy lmit in effect?

Guess maybe there is no bug.

Read full topic
item.source: Party doesn't occupy people if they were redirected to you via CW tornado

item.title: Party doesn't occupy people if they were redirected to you via CW tornado

item.description:
The CW would have been occupied. Possablely the assassin was occupied 3 times already?
